text: These go verbs, these verbs that take go instead of o for the i version in the present, also behave a little bit strangely in the future tenses, in the will and would tenses.

text: So of course it should be tenere.
speaker: Speaker 1

text: So that last e of tenere turns into a d and we get tendre.
